name: Protect the Land
description:
Whether you are a native fighting against overseas explorers, a regular guy with a gun in an alien invasion or even a gravedigger working during the uprising of the dead, you can't just walk away. Don't let yourself and your land be colonized. You need to PROTECT THE LAND!

Shoot with your weapon against the enemies that are advancing towards you in this colonization-inspired space invaders style game.

* This is the first game I made using GMS. This game's difficulty is highly unbalanced and the menu uses too many buttons... sorry for that, I'm uploading it the way it was made for miniLD69 (theme: colonization)

Btw, I left a debug feature on. You can press "P" to skip stages, so, if you find the game too difficult, skip some stages to see the other worlds :)
